program shik_and_game
  implicit none
  integer :: n, i, j = 0
  integer(8) :: e, t, x(100001) = 0_8, dp(0:100000) = 0_8, tmp = 0_8
  read(*,*) n, e, t
  read(*,*) x(1:n)
  x(n+1) = e
  do i = 1, n
    do while (2_8*(x(i)-x(j+1)) > t)
      tmp = min(tmp,dp(j)-2_8*x(j+1))
      j = j+1
    end do
    dp(i) = dp(j)+t
    if (j > 0) dp(i) = min(dp(i),2_8*x(i)+tmp)
  end do
  write(*,'(i0)') dp(n)+e
end program shik_and_game

using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
typedef unsigned long long ull;
typedef vector<int> vi;
typedef pair<int,int> ii;
typedef vector<ii> vii;
typedef vector<ll> vll;
typedef pair<ll,ll> pll;
#define IN inline
#define RE register
#define F first
#define S second
#define N 100005
#define mod 998244353
#define INF 0x3f3f3f3f
int n,t,e;
ll a[N],dp[N];
int main(){
	scanf("%d%d%d",&n,&e,&t);
	ll curmin=100000000000ll;
	int p=0;
	for(int i=1;i<=n;++i){
		scanf("%lld",a+i);
		while((a[i]-a[p+1]<<1)>t){
			curmin=min(curmin,dp[p]-(a[p+1]<<1));
			++p;
		}
		dp[i]=min(dp[p]+t,(a[i]<<1)+curmin);
		//printf("%d %lld\n",p,dp[i]);
	}
	printf("%lld\n",dp[n]+e);
	return 0;
}

type Answer = Int
answer :: Answer -> IO ()
answer = print

solve :: Int -> Int -> [Int] -> Answer
solve e t = go e
  where
    go s []  = s
    go s [_] = s + t
    go s xs = uncurry go . first (s +) $ inner 1 0 . head <*> id $ xs
    inner k l b (x : xs)
      | 2 * d <= s = inner (succ k) d b xs
      | otherwise  = (bool (min (pred k * t) (2 * l)) t (k == 2), x : xs)
      where
        d = x - b
        s = k * t
    inner k l _ _  = (min (pred k * t) (2 * l), [])

type Answer = Int
answer :: Answer -> IO ()
answer = print

solve :: Int -> Int -> [Int] -> Answer
solve e t = go e []
  where
    go x js (i : is)
      | null is   = z
      | otherwise = go z ((i, x) : js) is
      where
        z = dp js i (x + t)

    dp              []  _ = id
    dp ((j, x) : js) i
      | t > 2 * d = next dp  id (x + t)
      | otherwise = next dp2 (subtract $ 2 * i) (x - 2 * j)
      where
        d = i - j
        next f g = flip $ (f js i .) . flip min . g

    dp2              []  i = (2 * i +)
    dp2 ((j, x) : js) i = dp2 js i . min (x - 2 * j)

import Data.Bifunctor (bimap, first)
import Data.Maybe     (fromJust, fromMaybe, listToMaybe)

import Control.DeepSeq (deepseq)

main :: IO ()
main = do
    [n, e, t] <- fmap read . words <$> getLine
    xs        <- fmap read . words <$> getLine
    answer $ solve e t xs

type Answer = Int
answer :: Answer -> IO ()
answer = print

solve :: Int -> Int -> [Int] -> Answer
solve e t = go
  where
    go = negate . fromJust . inner (Just (-e), Nothing) []

    inner dp js      []  = fst dp
    inner dp js (i : is) = inner (deepseq dp (x, y)) js' is
      where
        p   = i - succ t `div` 2
        js' = dropWhile ((p >=) . fst) js ++ [(i, dp)]
        l   = snd <$> listToMaybe (init js')
        x  = max `uncurry` bimap (?- t) (?- 2 * i) (fromMaybe dp l)
        y  = max `uncurry` first (?+ 2 * i) dp

m ?+ x = deepseq <*> id $ (x +)      <$> m
m ?- x = deepseq <*> id $ subtract x <$> m
infixl 6 ?+, ?-

type Answer = Int
answer :: Answer -> IO ()
answer = print

solve :: Int -> Int -> [Int] -> Answer
solve e t = go e [] <*> id
  where
    go x ks (j : js) (i : is)
      | null js   = z
      | otherwise = go z ((j, z, x) : ks) js is
      where
        z = dp ks i (x + t)

    dp              []  _ = id
    dp ((j, k, x) : js) i
      | t > 2 * d = next dp  id k
      | otherwise = next dp2 (subtract $ 2 * i) (x - 2 * j)
      where
        d = i - j
        next f g = flip $ (f js i .) . flip min . g

    dp2              []  i = (2 * i +)
    dp2 ((j, _, x) : js) i = dp2 js i . min (x - 2 * j)

class MinSegTree():
    def __init__(self,N):
        self.Nelem = N
        self.size = 1<<(N.bit_length()) # è‘‰ã®è¦ç´ æ•°
        
    def build(self,raw_data):
        # raw_data ã¯ 0-indexed
        INF = 10**18
        self.data = [INF] * (2*self.size)
        for i,x in enumerate(raw_data):
            self.data[self.size+i] = x
        for i in range(self.size-1,0,-1):
            x = self.data[i+i]; y = self.data[i+i+1]
            self.data[i] = x if x<y else y
    
    def update(self,i,x):
        i += self.size
        self.data[i] = x
        i >>= 1
        while i:
            x = self.data[i+i]; y = self.data[i+i+1]
            self.data[i] = x if x<y else y
            i >>= 1
    
    def get_value(self,L,R):
        # [L,R] ã«å¯¾ã™ã‚‹å€¤ã‚’è¿”ã™
        L += self.size
        R += self.size + 1
        # [L,R) ã«å¤‰æ›´
        x = 10**18
        while L < R:
            if L&1:
                y = self.data[L]
                if x > y: x = y
                L += 1
                
            if R&1:
                R -= 1
                y = self.data[R]
                if x > y: x = y
            L >>= 1; R >>= 1
        return x

class MinSegTree():
    def __init__(self,N):
        self.Nelem = N
        self.size = 1<<(N.bit_length()) # è‘‰ã®è¦ç´ æ•°
        
    def build(self,raw_data):
        # raw_data ã¯ 0-indexed
        INF = 10**18
        self.data = [INF] * (2*self.size)
        for i,x in enumerate(raw_data):
            self.data[self.size+i] = x
        for i in range(self.size-1,0,-1):
            x = self.data[i+i]; y = self.data[i+i+1]
            self.data[i] = x if x<y else y
    
    def update(self,i,x):
        i += self.size
        self.data[i] = x
        i >>= 1
        while i:
            x = self.data[i+i]; y = self.data[i+i+1]
            self.data[i] = x if x<y else y
            i >>= 1
    
    def get_value(self,L,R):
        # [L,R] ã«å¯¾ã™ã‚‹å€¤ã‚’è¿”ã™
        L += self.size
        R += self.size + 1
        # [L,R) ã«å¤‰æ›´
        x = 10**18
        while L < R:
            if L&1:
                y = self.data[L]
                if x > y: x = y
                L += 1
                
            if R&1:
                R -= 1
                y = self.data[R]
                if x > y: x = y
            L >>= 1; R >>= 1
        return x

import sys


def solve(n, e, t, xxx):
    if n == 1:
        return e + t

    ans = xxx[0] + (e - xxx[-1])

    i = 0
    while i < n:
        for j in range(i, n - 1):
            dx0 = xxx[j] - xxx[i]
            dx1 = xxx[j + 1] - xxx[i]
            stop = max(2 * dx0, t) + dx0 + xxx[j + 1] - xxx[j] + t
            through = max(2 * dx1, t) + dx1
            if stop < through:
                ans += stop - t
                i = j + 1
                break
        else:
            dx1 = xxx[n - 1] - xxx[i]
            ans += max(2 * dx1, t) + dx1
            i = n

    return ans


n, e, t, *xxx = map(int, sys.stdin.buffer.read().split())
print(solve(n, e, t, xxx))

def segfunc(x, y):
    return min(x,y)
#################

#####ide_ele#####
ide_ele = float("inf")
#################

class SegTree:
    """
    init(init_val, ide_ele): é…åˆ—init_valã§åˆæœŸåŒ– O(N)
    update(k, x): kç•ªç›®ã®å€¤ã‚’xã«æ›´æ–° O(logN)
    query(l, r): åŒºé–“[l, r)ã‚’segfuncã—ãŸã‚‚ã®ã‚’è¿”ã™ O(logN)
    """
    def __init__(self, n, segfunc, ide_ele):
        """
        init_val: é…åˆ—ã®åˆæœŸå€¤
        segfunc: åŒºé–“ã«ã—ãŸã„æ“ä½œ
        ide_ele: å˜ä½å…ƒ
        n: è¦ç´ æ•°
        num: nä»¥ä¸Šã®æœ€å°ã®2ã®ã¹ãä¹—
        tree: ã‚»ã‚°ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆæœ¨(1-index)
        """
        self.segfunc = segfunc
        self.ide_ele = ide_ele
        self.num = 1 << (n - 1).bit_length()
        self.tree = [ide_ele] * 2 * self.num
        # é…åˆ—ã®å€¤ã‚’è‘‰ã«ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆ
        # æ§‹ç¯‰ã—ã¦ã„ã

    def update(self, k, x):
        """
        kç•ªç›®ã®å€¤ã‚’xã«æ›´æ–°
        k: index(0-index)
        x: update value
        """
        k += self.num
        self.tree[k] = x
        while k > 1:
            self.tree[k >> 1] = self.segfunc(self.tree[k], self.tree[k ^ 1])
            k >>= 1

    def query(self, l, r):
        """
        [l, r)ã®segfuncã—ãŸã‚‚ã®ã‚’å¾—ã‚‹
        l: index(0-index)
        r: index(0-index)
        """
        res = self.ide_ele

        l += self.num
        r += self.num
        while l < r:
            if l & 1:
                res = self.segfunc(res, self.tree[l])
                l += 1
            if r & 1:
                res = self.segfunc(res, self.tree[r - 1])
            l >>= 1
            r >>= 1
        return res

from sys import stdin
from itertools import repeat
def main():
    n, e, t = map(int, stdin.readline().split())
    x = map(int, stdin.readline().split(), repeat(10, n))
    i = 1
    j = 0
    dp = [0] * n
    f = [0] * n
    dp[0] = t
    f[0] = -x[0] * 2
    for i in xrange(1, n):
        dp[i] = dp[i-1]
        while j < i and (x[i] - x[j]) * 2 > t:
            j += 1
        dp[i] = dp[j] + t
        if j > 0 and dp[i] > f[j-1] + x[i] * 2:
            dp[i] = f[j-1] + x[i] * 2
        f[i] = dp[i] - x[i] * 2
        if f[i] > f[i-1]:
            f[i] = f[i-1]
    print dp[-1] + e
main()
